channel.title: Comments on: Best Bandwidth in Utah?

item.title: By: Leif Andersen
item.dc:creator: Leif Andersen
item.description: Fascinating, although I seem to get ~22 Mb download and slightly less for upload at the University of Utah, I've yet to see anything that good elsewhere, although I haven't really tried.
item.content:encoded: Fascinating, although I seem to get ~22 Mb download and slightly less for upload at the University of Utah, I’ve yet to see anything that good elsewhere, although I haven’t really tried.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2010/08/03/best-bandwidth-in-utah/#comment-3507">Random User</a>.
If that were the case wouldn't every town with Utopia show similar results?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Random User.

If that were the case wouldn’t every town with Utopia show similar results?

item.title: By: Random User
item.dc:creator: Random User
item.description: Its related to the Utopia presence in Brigham City.
item.content:encoded: Its related to the Utopia presence in Brigham City.
